DOC.brief_summary: Nestle Impact show efficacy multiple surgical trial relation improve hospital length stay infection rate . 1 dose Nestle Impact Advanced Recovery take orally three time day begin morning follow stem cell transplant continue day hospital discharge .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Impact Nutritional Program During Autologous Stem Cell Transplant
DOC.criteria: Patients receive autologous stem cell transplant use preparative regimen BEAM ( Carmustine , Etoposide , Cytarabine , Melphalan ) , Melphalan 140mg/m2 , Melphalan 200mg/m2 Any prior diet supplement allow . Age > 18 year . Ability understand willingness sign write informed consent document . History allergic reaction attribute compound similar chemical biologic composition Nestle Impact include fish oil .
